parameters.description: True for forward direction, false for reverse

title: IExtrudeFeatureData2.SetEndCondition
description: Sets the end condition type of the extrusion feature for the forward or reverse direction.
signature:
void SetEndCondition( 
   System.Boolean
Forward
,
   System.Int32
EndCondition
)

parameters.name: Forward
parameters.description: True for forward direction, false for reverse

parameters.name: EndCondition
parameters.description: End condition type as defined in swEndConditions_e
